body:
Comment 2: 
We generate DWARF 2, and any DWARF reader should accept that (we recently encountered a
slightly different issue--our debug/dwarf package doesn't understand DWARF 4, which we
should fix, but that is a matter of what we read, not what we generate).  It's hard for
me to believe that lldb doesn't support DWARF 2.

Certainly one problem here is that decent gdb support requires
pkg/runtime/runtime-gdb.py, which lldb presumably does not understand.  lldb does have
its own Python interface, but I don't know how similar it is to the gdb interface.
